name: mcp-server-prisma
description: Gives LLMs the ability to manage Prisma Postgres databases.

rating.reason: Mixed quality documentation with inconsistent naming conventions and parameter descriptions. Tool descriptions range from comprehensive (migrate-status, migrate-dev) to basic (Prisma-Login). Most tools have adequate functional descriptions but parameter documentation is consistently weak - the ubiquitous 'projectCWD' parameter lacks any description across all tools, and other parameters like 'name' and 'region' have minimal or missing descriptions. Naming is inconsistent with some tools using kebab-case and others using PascalCase.
